General.Name: Beijing Shiji Information Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Shiji Information Technology Co., Ltd. provides software solutions and information technology services for the hospitality, food service, retail, and entertainment industries in China and internationally. It also offers cloud and mobile PMS; payment gateways; data management solutions; point of sale software; IT services for restaurants; POS hardware, kitchen printers, and screens; inventory management software for restaurants; and e-commerce platforms for stores, products, orders, purchasing, delivery, maintenance, storage, finance, loyalty programs, and reporting. The company was founded in 1995 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.

1.Name: Mr. De Yuan  Lai
1.Title: CFO, Exec. VP, Sr. VP of Greater China & Director
